title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 24 February 2014 - XWiki
content:

09:08 <Sidali> has joined #xwiki  
09:08 <DarkKnightCZ> what could be the cause of "X is not defined" (javascript console)? I guess something is loading before it should (since X is defined after dom is fully loaded), it's about this extension - http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Polls+Application  
09:09 <Guest38699> has quit  
09:10 <joel1> has joined #xwiki  
09:15 <Sidali> has joined #xwiki  
09:15 <Guest38699> has joined #xwiki  
09:20 <KermitTheFragger> has joined #xwiki  
09:34 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
09:36 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
09:53 <msmeria> vmassol1: good morning. I know XWiki 5.4.2 is supposed to be released soon. Do you need me to test something in particular for this version ?  
09:55 <msmeria> I was thinking of testing migrations on different db's from 4.5.4  
09:59 <vmassol1> hi msmeria  
09:59 <vmassol1> is now known as <vmassol>  
10:00 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
10:00 <vmassol> I'd say the usual, i.e. what's in the release notes + migrations + different dbs + different browsers :)  
10:00 <vmassol> (a combination of those since testing everything is too long obviously ;))  
10:00 <vmassol> thanks for asking  
10:01 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
10:01 <vmassol> guys, fyi thomas is going to be mostly off during the coming 2 days  
10:01 <vmassol> (baby 2.0 arrival)  
10:02 <msmeria> vmassol: ok. thanks!  
10:06 <GuillaumeF> has joined #xwiki  
10:36 <DarkKnightCZ> were there any changes in xwiki-platform-oldcore between 5.4 and 5.4.1?  
10:37 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
10:37 <vmassol> DarkKnightCZ: you can ask github about that  
10:39 <DarkKnightCZ> vmassol: oh, right, keep forgetting that :)  
10:39 <vmassol> https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/compare/xwiki-platform-5.4...xwiki-platform-5.4.1  
10:40 <DarkKnightCZ> yep, thanks  
11:02 <DarkKnightCZ1> has joined #xwiki

11:51 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
11:51 <DarkKnightCZ1> has left #xwiki  
11:54 <DarkKnightCZ> hi, i'm having trouble with 5.1 -> 5.4.1 upgrade, distribution wizard failed with this message - http://oi57.tinypic.com/29uvuxy.jpg  
11:54 <DarkKnightCZ> also, i wonder why it thinks it has 5.3 version (since the upgrade is fresh from 5.1, db migration finished successfully)  
12:00 <DarkKnightCZ> ok, so reverse proxy (nginx) created this issue, but i think distribution manager should follow redirects  
12:02 <msmeria> vmassol: after migrating from 4.5.4 to 5.4.2 on jetty/hsqldb I noticed these bugs:  
12:02 <msmeria> 1 in the Wiki Index livetable (WikiManager/WebHome) you see the keys instead of the translations; after you restart the server it's fixed  
12:03 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: that one is for you :)  
12:03 <msmeria> 2 the old wiki template (http://localhost:8080/xwiki/wiki/templatexe.localdomain.com/view/Main/WebHome) doesn't appear in the Wiki Index livetable  
12:03 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: also for you ;)  
12:04 <msmeria> 3 on main.webhome in the spaces macro you see some technical spaces: xapp, xappclasses, xappsheets etc.  
12:04 <gdelhumeau> hi  
12:04 <msmeria> I think no 3 was already reported some time ago  
12:04 <gdelhumeau> vmassol: The translations are stored in a Wiki Page  
12:04 <gdelhumeau> I don't see why I need to be restarted  
12:05 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: does not compute. Not sure what you are referring to and what question you're answering from me :)  
12:05 <msmeria> that's it ...for now :)  
12:05 <gdelhumeau> templateexe -> XWIKI-10010 (fixed in 5.4.2)  
12:05 <vmassol> I have no clue why you'd need to be restarted ;)  
12:05 <gdelhumeau> lol  
12:06 <gdelhumeau> I mean "it" ;)  
12:06 <msmeria> gdelhumeau: the wiki is called templatexe not template  
12:06 <gdelhumeau> I was talking about <msmeria> 1 in the Wiki Index livetable (WikiManager/WebHome) you see the keys instead of the translations; after you restart the server it's fixed  
12:06 <gdelhumeau> msmeria: then I should update the JIRA issue  
12:06 <gdelhumeau> every wiki name that starts with "template" are concerned I guess  
12:07 <msmeria> gdelhumeau: yes but the bigger problem is that it's not fixed  
12:07 <gdelhumeau> hmm... not ure  
12:07 <gdelhumeau> \*not sure  
12:07 <gdelhumeau> msmeria: you tested with the last SNAPSHOT ?  
12:07 <msmeria> even after server restart  
12:07 <msmeria> gdelhumeau: the last one I got this morning, yes  
12:07 <gdelhumeau> ok thanks :)  
12:07 <msmeria> it's from Friday  
12:07 <msmeria> so pretty old  
12:08 <msmeria> but your fix is earlier that that so it should've worked  
12:08 <msmeria> you're welcome  
12:08 <msmeria> than\*  
12:09 <gdelhumeau> msmeria: do you have view rights on templateexe ?  
12:09 <msmeria> gdelhumeau: yes, I'm logged in with Admin  
12:09 <msmeria> if I manually type in the address I can access the Wiki  
12:10 <msmeria> another bug: I don't have any Wiki Administration link for it  
12:11 <msmeria> I mean i don't have any Wiki menu: just Home, Space and Page menus  
12:13 <gdelhumeau> where? when you go to templatexe ?  
12:15 <msmeria> gdelhumeau: yes, just on that subwiki  
12:15 <gdelhumeau> what is the user scope of it?  
12:17 <msmeria> it's a wiki with local users if that's what you mean  
12:21 <gdelhumeau> yes, then the Home menu is not visible  
12:22 <msmeria> gdelhumeau: you didn't understand  
12:23 <msmeria> for example on another subwiki with local users I don't have the Home menu, but I have a Wiki menu for Administration  
12:23 <msmeria> on templatexe wiki I HAVE the Home menu, but don't have a menu for the subwiki Administration  
12:26 <gdelhumeau> ok, then it is very weird indeed  
12:26 <gdelhumeau> can I have an URL?  
12:27 <lucaa> has quit  
12:29 <msmeria> gdelhumeau: in a couple of minutes. I'm currently migrating on another db  
12:29 <gdelhumeau> ok thx  
12:40 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
12:42 <msmeria> gdelhumeau: me too
